# [Interview #1084: Ask the Author: Brandon Sanderson, Entry #38](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1084#38)

#### Question

What was your inspiration for Kaladin? Do you plan any European signingsâ€”we will be trilled to have you here!

#### Brandon Sanderson

I was just there last week! :) (In spain and the UK.)

Kaladin was inspired originally by reading about surgeons in the middle ages.
